title: Radical 166
text:
Radical 166 or radical village () meaning "<a href="village">village</a>" or "<a href="li%20%28unit%29">li</a>" (a traditional Chinese unit of distance) is one of the 20 <a href="List%20of%20Kangxi%20radicals">Kangxi radicals</a> (214 radicals in total) composed of 7 <a href="stroke%20%28CJK%20character%29">strokes</a>.
In the "<a href="Kangxi%20Dictionary">Kangxi Dictionary</a>", there are 14 characters (out of 49,030) to be found under this <a href="Radical%20%28Chinese%20character%29">radical</a>.
 is also the 157th indexing component in the "<a href="Table%20of%20Indexing%20Chinese%20Character%20Components">Table of Indexing Chinese Character Components</a>" predominantly adopted by <a href="Simplified%20Chinese%20characters">Simplified Chinese</a> dictionaries published in <a href="mainland%20China">mainland China</a>.
In Simplified Chinese, or which mean "inside" is merged to .
